# API-USERS Feature

## Description

Backend user management API endpoints

## Stories

| ID | Title | Status | Complexity | Estimate | Owner | Milestone | Jira | OpenSpec | Tags | Notes |
|----|-------|--------|------------|----------|-------|-----------|------|----------|------|-------|
| API-USERS-01 | Get User Profile | done | S | 2 | backend-team | | | | users,api | GET /users/:id endpoint returning user profile data (name, email, avatar). |
| API-USERS-02 | Update User Profile | in_progress | M | 4 | backend-team | | | | users,api | PUT /users/:id endpoint to update user profile fields. |
